channel.title: debian on Clean-Ink
channel.description: Recent content in debian on Clean-Ink

item.title: DWM on Debian
item.description: Debian install dwm https://github.com/sgomare/featherOS.git https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/Debian-titus.git https://github.com/drewgrif/dwm-debian.git https://github.com/PietJanHein/dwm-setup https://johnjago.com/dwm/ Base Instructions from https://johnjago.com/dwm/ wget https://dl.suckless.org/dwm/dwm-6.4.tar.gz wget https://dl.suckless.org/tools/dmenu-5.2.tar.gz wget https://dl.suckless.org/st/st-0.9.tar.gz tar xf (each_dir) cd (each_dir) make sudo make clean install sudo apt install make gcc libx11-dev libxft-dev libxinerama-dev xorg kitty thunar Next, create a file called .xinitrc in your home directory. Place this inside of it: while xsetroot -name "`date` `uptime | sed 's/.*,//'`" do sleep 1 done exec dwm other situs soon II
